room_title: Escape room "CAMPED! The Hairy Truth" by Trapped Columbus in Columbus
review: Went here with my work crew--12 of us total. It was awesome. We didn't win (we were sooooo close). Everyone in my group raved about how fun it was.The clues were challenging, but doable. Different people on my team worked together at different times to solve clues, and it was a great team building experience.We did have a zombie in the room; he added a TON of pressure, but we really enjoyed it.

room_title: Escape room "CAMPED! The Hairy Truth" by Trapped Columbus in Columbus
review: It was a very fun exciting new experience , very carefully detailed, great for a night out! I will definitely go again to try all the rooms. I highly recommend!
